short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable advanced features while using Responsivfy.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extension to enable advanced features within Responsivfy.com including:
- Sync responsive previews
- Unblock previewing restricted websites due to X-Frame-Options header
